footer.quote: Elevate your venue experience with premium photo booth technology that customers love and remember.

hero.description: Elevate your venue with Glimps photo booths—a premium amenity that increases customer engagement, dwell time, and generates social media exposure.
hero.footer: Trusted by 200+ venues and entertainment spots nationwide

features.title: Why Venue Owners Love Glimps
features.description: Our premium photo booths are designed specifically for venues in the hospitality and entertainment industry.

preiumExperience.title: Premium Photo Experience
preiumExperience.description: High-quality cameras and professional lighting ensure your customers get magazine-worthy photos every time.

customerEngagement.title: Increased Customer Engagement
customerEngagement.description: Create memorable experiences that keep customers in your venue longer and coming back for more.

revenueGeneration.title: Revenue Generation
revenueGeneration.description: An additional revenue stream with flexible pricing models to suit your business.

socialMedia.title: Social Media Amplification
socialMedia.description: Instant social sharing with your branded templates increases visibility and attracts new customers.

howItWorks.title: How Glimps Works for Your Venue

1.title: Seamless Installation
1.description: Our team handles the complete setup of your custom-branded photo booth in a spot that maximizes visibility and usage.

2.title: Customer Engagement
2.description: Guests use the intuitive touchscreen interface to take photos, apply filters, and instantly share branded content to their social networks.

3.title: Analytics & Growth
3.description: Access real-time data on usage, popular times, and social sharing reach to measure ROI and optimize your marketing.

testimonials.title: What Venue Owners Are Saying
testimonials.description: Join hundreds of satisfied venue owners who've transformed their customer experience with Glimps.

1.author: Kaari
1.quote: Since installing Glimps, our weekend revenue has increased by 22%. Customers love it and many come specifically for the photo experience.

2.author: Jani
2.quote: The team at Glimps made setup incredibly easy. Their responsive support and regular updates keep the system running smoothly.

3.author: Mika
3.quote: Our customers spend an average of 40 minutes longer in our venue when using the Glimps booth. It's been a game-changer for our business.

stats.title: The Glimps Impact
stats.description: Real results from venues using our photo booths.

increaseCustomerDwellTime.label: Average increase in customer dwell time

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Venue?
cta.description: Join the Glimps family and elevate your customer experience.

about.title: About Glimps
about.description: We're revolutionizing the venue experience through innovative photo technology that creates memories and drives business growth.

description.description1: Glimps was born in 2018 when our founder, Alex Rivera, noticed a problem at his downtown entertainment venue. Customers were constantly asking staff to take photos of them, disrupting service and often resulting in poor-quality images that didn't capture the premium experience of the venue.
description.description2: Working with a team of photography and software experts, Alex developed a prototype photo booth specifically designed for upscale venues. The results were immediate: customers loved the experience, spent more time in the venue, and enthusiastically shared their photos on social media, driving new business.
description.description3: Since then, Glimps has expanded to serve hundreds of venues across the country, from intimate lounges to large nightclubs, restaurants, event spaces, and more. Our mission remains the same: to create memorable experiences for guests while driving measurable business results for venue owners.
description.description4: Today, our team of 35 passionate individuals continues to innovate at the intersection of hospitality, entertainment, photography, and technology. We're proud to be trusted by some of the most respected establishments in the industry and are constantly evolving our product based on partner feedback and emerging trends.

ourValues.title: Our Values
ourValues.description: These core principles guide everything we do at Glimps.

quality.title: Quality Above All
quality.description: We never compromise on the quality of our hardware, software, or customer experience.

partnerSuccess.title: Partner Success
partnerSuccess.description: Your success is our success. We're committed to helping your business grow with our solution.

innovation.title: Continuous Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly evolve our technology to stay ahead of trends and customer expectations.

service.title: Exceptional Service
service.description: We provide responsive, helpful support to ensure your photo booth always performs at its best.
